text: S.B. “And hopefully it’ll be successful. When you get down to it, the only way we get to make movies is by making someone some money. If this film doesn’t perform, then it’ll be another political statement. I don’t want that. What would be nice is that if this works, it works because it was a good movie, and that people forget that it was a group of eight women. And then maybe this group of eight women will take on a ninth person, and we’ll be able to do it again. But it all depends on how it performs.”
authors: Stop Asking The Oceans Cast If They Are Friends
title: The Ocean's 8 Cast Kindly Requests You Stop Asking This Question

meta_data.title: Stop Asking The Oceans 8 Cast If They Are Friends
meta_data.description: Can we really talk about a movie like "Ocean's 8" without mentioning its all-female cast? Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett and Awkwafina weigh in.
